name: wind
comment: Wind profile injected on the Power bus (pseudo-unit for weather data).

name: solar
comment: Fixed tilt PV resource represented via weather data.

name: solar_tracking
comment: Slot for tracking PV profiles (kept non-extendable by default).

name: grid
comment: Placeholder for grid imports; prohibitively expensive to discourage use.

name: ramp_dummy
comment: Helper generator that feeds the ramp penalty link to enforce smoothing.
